analysis.description:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#672-679) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#675-678)

NeLunaCoinCrowdsale.getTokensBackAFterCorwdsale (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,tokensLeft) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#454-462) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#456-460)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#470-480) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#480)

NeLunaCoinCrowdsale._getTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#989-1002) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- period1 >= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#991-993)
	- period3 >= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#995-1001)
	- period2 >= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#993-995)

NeLunaCoin.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#943)
NeLunaCoin.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#940-942)
NeLunaCoin.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x3855024445fada90ae1f418a095714cf4dc9fc3f.sol#942-943)
